benefits.text: YetiFoam eliminates up to 40% insulation performance loss from thermal bridging by providing a continuous adhered layer over all metal surfaces.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Fibreglass batts + building wrap still lose 40% efficiency due to bridging—requiring 4 separate products that fail to address the core issue.

benefits.text: On a 32°C day, the average Victorian roof surface hits 71°C. YetiFoam completely eliminates this external temperature impact by blocking radiant heat gain.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Anti-con blanket provides negligible radiant heat reduction—less than 5%—while YetiFoam eliminates it entirely. Fibreglass insulation offers virtually zero benefit under metal roofs.

benefits.text: YetiFoam boosts structural resistance in stud walls by up to 124%, ideal for metal frame walls in sheds.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Fibreglass provides no structural enhancement whatsoever.

benefits.text: YetiFoam increases wind uplift resistance by up to 300% in shed roofs.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Foilboard offers partial coverage with negligible wind resistance enhancement.

benefits.text: YetiFoam eliminates roof leak risks without replacing roofs or flashings on Colourbond sheds by forming a seamless, fully adhered waterproof membrane.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Anti-con blanket degrades over time with leaks, unlike YetiFoam's 97.6% 25-year leak-free rate.

benefits.text: YetiFoam achieves 97.6% leak-free performance over 25 years in roof applications, with 93% showing less than 1% degradation.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Competitors degrade significantly, requiring replacement cycles that YetiFoam eliminates entirely.

benefits.text: YetiFoam completely eliminates condensation in sheds by creating a continuous thermal break, acting as a Class II vapour barrier (upgradeable to Class I at 75mm).
benefits.competitor_contrast: Fibreglass batts + building wrap fail to prevent condensation on metal surfaces—YetiFoam eliminates moisture risks entirely.

benefits.text: YetiFoam creates a single monolithic leak-proof structure by encasing all members and shell.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Partial treatments 'manage' condensation by hiding it. YetiFoam eliminates it by sealing everything into one continuous system.

benefits.text: YetiFoam achieves 30% better performance in shed walls than fibreglass, even without considering air-sealing factors.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Fibreglass batts with building wrap show 20-30% less efficiency in walls than YetiFoam, ignoring air gaps.

benefits.text: YetiFoam covers fasteners and penetrations fully, blocking thermal bridging pathways that reduce insulation effectiveness by up to 31.5%.
Fibreglass insulation offers virtually zero benefit under metal roofs, unlike YetiFoam's full performance.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Standard insulation specs don't cover thermal bridging, structural enhancement, or condensation elimination.

benefits.text: YetiFoam withstands wind gusts 34% higher than Melbourne's record, with zero damage.
YetiFoam enhances brace energy dissipation by up to 191%, maintaining compliance with AS 4100.
YetiFoam increases wall racking resistance to meet wind-load needs, reducing need for supplementary fixings.
YetiFoam eliminates thermal shock expansion, preventing structural degradation and corrosion in sheds.
YetiFoam forms a seamless, fully adhered waterproof membrane, preventing water penetration and lateral travel.
YetiFoam creates a seamless air barrier eliminating leaks entirely.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Fibreglass batts provide negligible insulation under metal roofs due to air gaps.

benefits.text: YetiFoam sprays as a monolithic layer, eliminating installation gaps and enhancing structural resistance.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Gaps in fibreglass batts + building wrap lead to inconsistent coverage and energy loss.

benefits.text: YetiFoam maintains R-value by covering thermal bridges—fasteners in fibreglass installs can reduce effectiveness by up to 31.5%.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Thermal bridging in fibreglass setups can eliminate up to 40% performance.

benefits.text: Batts on metal require 4 products (wall, vapor barrier, wrap, batts). YetiFoam does it with 1 seamless application.
benefits.competitor_contrast: Complexity drives failure and deniability in alternatives.
